Topic.Title: Rafael Edward "Ted" Cruz!

Message.Msg: Seriously Don, when has either party hit the brakes and skidded to a stop without any residual. Realistically the spending will always be there - not matter who's in office! I doubt things will change - every presidential election requires pointing the finger at the other guy as being the bad guy - you see no one takes responsibility anymore. Its like a broken car - you need to mend it simply to get to work or you get you #$%$ in debt with a new one till that one breaks down - there's always some expense - again and again and again. Just gotta grin and bare!!! :(
